awakenings.effect: When self activates [auto Skill], can also trigger passive effects
[Skills] and [Normal Attack] level and level cap +4
When using ultimate skill, the number of follow-up attacks triggered changes from 1 time to 2 times.

effects: After landing an extra attack, gain +36 % Crit Rate for 10 s.
memoryCard.name: Perverted Little Nurse (变态小护士)

auto.description: Deals 120 % ATK Wind damage to the targeted enemy and gains 2 Marks.
auto.name: Abyss Roar (深渊之咆哮)

normal.description: Deals 120 % ATK Wind damage to the targeted enemy.
normal.name: Leviathan's Kiss (利维坦之吻)

passive.description: When our allied units use auto skills and hit enemies, consume 1 Mark to perform an extra attack dealing 180 % ATK Wind damage.
passive.name: Grudge Deep Chain (怨恨深链)

ultimate.description: Deals 600 % ATK Wind damage to the targeted enemy, then immediately performs 1 extra attack that does NOT consume a Mark.
ultimate.name: Seven Deadly Sins: Jiāolú (七大罪：娇炉)
